item.title: In Defense of Interestingness
item.description:
Yes, start with the pedagogy, but be interesting (and don’t just rely on the content for that).

Okay, so, here’s the thing: teaching is performative. That, in itself, isn’t new or earth-shattering for anyone that’s taught for any period of time. Pretty pedestrian as far as teaching relevations go, I feel.
